snippet: The Sacramento Kings are regrouping under Keith Smart, who talked extensively about the challenges in front of him.
abstract: The Sacramento Kings are regrouping under Keith Smart, who talked extensively about the challenges in front of him.
lead_paragraph: On Thursday, nearly two weeks into a lockout-shortened season, the Sacramento Kings were 2-5, had a feud play out in public between the team's coach and a young star, which led to the coach's firing, and were scheduled to play the Milwaukee Bucks in what would be the team's fifth game in six nights.

headline.main: Kings Hope Change Is for the Better
